name: Coots Night
description:
If you played the game, please could leave a review, Thank you!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Coots Night is an linear horror walking simulator. You play as Coots (the cat) who has stayed outside after the towns curfew at midnight. You wake up and try to find your way home back to "Ludwig".

WARNING:

Jump-scares, loud noises and a cat...

IMPORTANT:

This was created in around 5 days for the ludwig game jam. It will lack in content and quality but hopefully i can improve some stuff after the jam.
